Raymond E. Daly

dcterms:description: A large dataset of movie reviews for sentiment analysis, containing 50,000 reviews split equally into training and test sets.
dcterms:title: IMDB

dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin
Jean Wu
Jason Chuang
Christopher D. Manning
Andrew Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: A smaller sentiment analysis dataset derived from the Stanford Sentiment Treebank, containing 8,581 sentences split into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: SST-2

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A dataset for natural language inference containing 570k premise-hypothesis pairs labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutral.
dcterms:title: SNLI
